IÃ¢â‚¬â„¢m not positive if someoneÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s already done this kind of thing and If it already exists, please tell me.

So for this challenge you are going to (stock (kerbal engineer is OK)) make a rocket or station flying in a low orbit of minmus or the mun (gilly would be too easy) that is capable of de-orbiting a kerbal from a single blast of its engines (one to cancel out firsts thrust. the orbit limits will be: maximum 40,000m and no minimum. I have a feeling that this is probably going to be pretty easy but also really fun :D If you pull it off, give me a screen shot or video please :D

ADDED BONUS: Rendezvous with your craft in EVA from the surface of your celestial body and board it. Now you can give yourself a pat on the back!
